com.soa.console.binding

Interface BindingContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface BindingContext
extends java.io.Serializable
    The BindingContext is wsdl binding context interface containing information regarding wsdl binding implementation.
    Since:
    6.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.xml.namespace.QName getBindingName()
      Returns the binding's name.
      javax.wsdl.Definition getDefinition()
      Returns WSDL definition containing binding element representing the binding.
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Returns the binding's desription.
      javax.xml.namespace.QName getInterfaceName()
      Return interface name of the WSDL Port Type the binding implements.

    • Method Detail

      • getInterfaceName

        javax.xml.namespace.QName getInterfaceName()
        Return interface name of the WSDL Port Type the binding implements.
        Returns:

      • getBindingName

        javax.xml.namespace.QName getBindingName()
        Returns the binding's name. This name could be used to retrieve WSDL Binding object from Definition
        Returns:

      • getDefinition

        javax.wsdl.Definition getDefinition()
        Returns WSDL definition containing binding element representing the binding. Binding author can update the WSDL Definition with binding specific information.
        Returns:

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns the binding's desription.
        Returns:
